name: openllmchat
description: Two AI agents conversing for 10 turns with shared context

scripts.stop: sh -c 'PORT_TO_KILL=${PORT:-3000}; PIDS=$(lsof -ti tcp:$PORT_TO_KILL -sTCP:LISTEN); if [ -n "$PIDS" ]; then echo "Stopping openllmchat on port $PORT_TO_KILL (pid: $PIDS)"; echo "$PIDS" | xargs kill; else echo "No process listening on port $PORT_TO_KILL"; fi'
